fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
20% Coupon
1 Generator: 30% Coupon
2 Generators: 50% Coupon
3 Generators: 80% Coupon

1 Generator costs $200.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If a player lands on this property when it is owned, when the owner lands on the player's property, they pay some % less rent depending on how many generators are on the tile at the time the owner lands on the player's property.
